Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

Cooley: Taking another drink of the flask gets up and starts to walk down the hallway thinking bout the situation and begins running towards the Entrance of the Base. For he remembered in his Galavanting round the Base Cloaked that Kup usually is around the entrance of the base.
airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:Nightlight/YDrassil/Windlord:

Windlord looking to Cooley he told him anxously "Quick!!!! Look for 
Kup!!!! He must be here somewhere!!!!!" He ran to help Rodimus to 
hold Nighlight in order to let him check her systems.  Nighlight 
countinued uncounceaus, Ydrassil appeared and looking around 
say "What the pit it's goin on here!!! " 

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> He felt Nightlight go limp in his arms.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Nightlight?
> 
> He shakes her a bit.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Nightlight? Nightlight, say something... Someone 
get help!!!!
> 
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Nighlgiht:
> 
> Nighlight sobbed quietly while she heard Rodimus and her pain was 
> increasing, then she felt his lips kissing her and she huged him 
> strong trying to keep him while her worries and pain increased to 
> unberable proportions. But soon without warning she released him 
and 
> her neck fall behind, her sobs sudenly stopped and if ROdimus 
hasn't 
> holding her she would have fallen. Her face reveals emotional pain 
> but she was in a sort of stasis.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> wrote:
> > ***Maximals/Autobots***
> >  
> > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> >  
> > Rodimus pulls Nightlight close. He slowly wipes her tears away 
> before letting his head slump, their foreheads touching.
> >  
> > He now spoke to her in a whisper.
> >  
> > Rodimus Prime: There is still some time, but we shouldn't put 
all 
> our egss in one basket. What if the gun fails? I have more faith 
in 
> the Matrix. If I can find it, i know I can protect us. All of us. 
> Please, let me try to do that. Let me keep you and Elita safe. I 
> love you.
> >  
> > Rodimus tils his head to the right, catching her lips with his, 
> sharing a emotional kiss.
> 
> 
>
